entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Uranium City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:11 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
